data.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild Guide
data.meta_description: This page contains information on the main Locations and Regions of The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. Hyrule is a large world to explore. In all the
data.text:
This page contains information on the main Locations and Regions of The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. Hyrule is a large world to explore. In all the Regions of Hyrule, you'll find towers to climb, shrines to explore, towns to rest at - and much more. Following is a summary of each region of Hyrule with an associated Tower.

There are numerous locations in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild that do not immediately appear on the map until Link travels to them. Each location adds 0.08 or 0.09 to your 100 percent completion rate.
